name: NIGHT SHIFT AT LINUS'S
description:
You play as a night guard working the night shift at Linus's Art Gallery of Wonders & Dreams. Could anything go wrong?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Movement = WASD Keys.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Phone ringtone music is: Late Night Radio by Kevin MacLeod:

https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7613-late-night-radio
